member_organisations: We are growing our membership after launching in Brussels in January 2017. Members include; Lexmark Inc, IBM, Autocraft, Volvo, SKF, Panalpina, syncreon, COCIR, ETIRA, FIRM, and a number of SME members including Aspire, APD, ARP (Netherlands) Slaters Electrical and GIT
fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Consumers, Environment, External Relations, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Circular Economy, Trade, External Relations, Product Policy and Design.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: The promotion of remanufacturing as an essential element of the circular economy and industrial strategy.
relevant_communication: The CER was established following the successful completion of a Horizon 2020 funded research project ERN (European Research Network) the outputs from which are at www.remanufacturing.eu
